desc: Welcome to the official site for The Last Coat, where our mission is to help you get a World-Class, Head-Turning shine, in half the time. The goal with all of our products is to give you professional long lasting results in much less time than you would expect. Ease of use and results is our motto.

layout.text:
Protect, Clean, & Shine Your Ride
in Half the Time.
The Last Coat® products leave any surface looking polished, protected, and silky smooth, INSTANTLY - Guaranteed.
The easiest products you'll ever use.
